Html:
I'm trying to install the 4.4.32.1 nuget package to a new WP 8.1 app but keep getting this error message:

Installing 'Portable.MvvmLightLibs 4.4.32.1'.
Successfully installed 'Portable.MvvmLightLibs 4.4.32.1'.
Adding 'Portable.MvvmLightLibs 4.4.32.1' to TestApplication.
Uninstalling 'Portable.MvvmLightLibs 4.4.32.1'.
Successfully uninstalled 'Portable.MvvmLightLibs 4.4.32.1'.
Install failed. Rolling back...
Could not install package 'Portable.MvvmLightLibs 4.4.32.1'. You are trying to install this package into a project that targets 'WindowsPhoneApp,Version=v8.1', but the package does not contain any assembly references or content files that are compatible with that framework. For more information, contact the package author.

Any ideas as to why I can't install? Has anyone posted compiled PCL binaries?

Hi,

I will check it out. It should work (yeah I know, standard BS reply ;)

Can you please try with the MVVMLightLibsOnly package?

Thanks
Laurent

Argh it was a PEBKAC issue. I had to update my nuget feature and it worked after that!

Thanks,
Sohum.
